SmokyScotch 0.6.0
  • Reference

Creating CV data partition

cv_partition.Rd

Creating CV data partition

cv_partition(x, y, nfolds)

Arguments

x

x should be a matrix without rownames
y

y should be true labels
nfolds

number of folds

Examples

x = iris[51:150, -5]
y = factor(iris[51:150, 5])
cvp = cv_partition(x = x, y = y, nfolds = 5)
cvp
#> $fold_num
